about_the_game:
When the ritual begins it is feeding time. From what can be gathered the disturbed creature lurking in the deep caves must be fed the strange orb-shaped beings for substance or he will consume the body. A sacrifice to pay for the ritual of leaving the secret sanctuary. One of the many strange creatures found in these labs, but by far one of the most terrifying to be reported will hunt you until the very end. Leave the blue colored beings in the altar room where the ritual began. Four should sustain his hunger and reverse his summoning. After you may finish the ritual with the teleporter device located in the large, tile room.

Remember:
Find the strange alien creatures known as the orbs.
Bring them to where the ritual began.
When the four are left leave through the portal.


Thank you for playing and I hope you enjoy my first published project.
-With much appreciation, The Bry Guy.

name: MR 333

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD FX-9830P RADEON R7
  • Graphics: AMD RADEON RX 460
  • DirectX: Version 9.0

short_description: When the ritual begins it is feeding time. Find his substance or he will consume your body.
